author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three persons including the conductor of a Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC) bus died on the spot after the bus rammed a sand-laden lorry near Gajalnaickenpatty on the Madurai-Bengaluru National Highway here on Saturday.

The incident took place at 5.30 a.m. when the Salem-bound bus from Tiruchi with 25 passengers was nearing Nalikalpatti-Panamarathupatty junction, failed to notice a lorry, which had been parked along the highway, hit the rear of the vehicle.

In the impact, the right side of the bus was completely ripped apart, resulting in the death of the three.
title: Three killed as bus rams lorry
